TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Silong, title = Silong, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Silong} }

S.FORM: Silong Itiniay i Fuxing Cen no Taoyuan ko Silong a niyaro', 11 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 34 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 82% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 28 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 18% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 6 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal76%, Amis3%, roma3%.

Silong Itiniay i Foxing Cen no Taoyoan ko Silong a niyaro', 11 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 34 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 82% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 28 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 18% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 6 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal76%, Amis3%, roma3%.
